name: Mola mola: Megan
detailed_description:
characterization


『Mola mola: Megan』 is an otaku-to-leisure puzzle game,You can restore the picture by clicking and dragging the square.
The game supports one-click restore function and perspective mode，Easily unlock all images and view perspectives at will.
There is no unlock time and rating system in the game.Be able to devote yourself to a happy mood.(๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧

Features


■ 100 worthy achievements

■ All pictures will move(｡◕∀◕｡)

■ Can undress

■ One-click Restart[Q]

■ One-click Finish[E]

■ Perspective mode(〃∀〃)

■ Input"R18 & R15" to change level

short_description: Casual decompression game, easy to experience a good mood.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: graphics card supporting DirectX 9
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 4 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: graphics card supporting DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contain content not appropriate for all ages: Nudity or Sexual Content

The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
